actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-175.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 274 - 131 (Record Vote No: 155).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill (H.R. 4119) making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4119 (Agriculture and Rural Development).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill (H.R. 4119) making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982, and for other purposes.
